RelatedSentence: MOSCOW , May 19 ( RIA Novosti ) - Rescuers from the Russian Emergency Ministry working in flood - hit Serbia have evacuated nearly 100 people in a single day , a representative of the Russian crisis office at the site of the disaster told RIA Novosti .

A0: a representative of the Russian crisis office at the site of the disaster
RelatedSentence: Some 96 people , including 28 children , have been taken out of the flooded areas over the past day , the representative said .
Russian rescuers have evacuated more than 2,000 people , including 604 children , since the worst flood in a century hit Serbia last week .
Serbia , as well as Bosnia and Herzegovina , declared a state of emergency in most areas of the country .
On Thursday , Serbia asked Russia and the European Commission for humanitarian aid .

A0: MOSCOW , May 19 -LRB- RIA Novosti -RRB- -- Rescuers from the Russian Emergency Ministry working in flood-hit Serbia
RelatedSentence: Russia dispatched its aid to Serbia on Friday , as well as 72 world - class rescuers , 10 lifeboats and other equipment .
